info.title: Microstrate Gateway
info.description: Microstrate Gateway API for managing gateway infrastructure and routing API requests.

post.description: Creates a new gateway with a unique topic and URL.

get.description: Retrieves details about a specific gateway.
Retrieves a list of all available gateways.

post.summary: Create a new mapping for a gateway
post.description: Creates a new path mapping within the specified gateway.

get.summary: Get all mappings for a gateway
get.description: Retrieves all mappings defined for the specified gateway.
Retrieves information about a specific gateway mapping.

patch.description: Updates an existing gateway mapping configuration.

delete.description: Marks a gateway mapping as deleted (poison-pilled).

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available gateway mappings.

post.description: Creates a new version for an existing mapping.

get.summary: Get all versions for a mapping
get.description: Retrieves all versions defined for a specific mapping.

200.description: List of mapping versions retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieves information about a specific mapping version.

patch.description: Updates an existing mapping version configuration.

delete.description: Marks a mapping version as deleted (poison-pilled).

200.description: Mapping version marked as deleted successfully

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available mapping versions.

200.description: List of mapping versions retrieved successfully

path_param.name: path
path_param.description: Path segment of the mapping in dot notation

method_param.name: method
method_param.description: HTTP method for the mapping in lowercase

gateway_topic_param.name: gateway_topic
gateway_topic_param.description: Unique topic identifier of the gateway

version_number_param.name: version_number
version_number_param.description: Sequential version number of the mapping version

method_query_param.name: method
method_query_param.description: HTTP method for the mapping in uppercase

path_query_param.name: path
path_query_param.description: URL path for the mapping including the leading slash

time.description: Time window for rate limiting in milliseconds

resource.description: Resource identifier for the middleware function

resource_type.description: Type of resource the middleware points to

resource_version.description: Version of the middleware resource to use

middleware.description: List of middleware to be applied to the gateway

timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for gateway requests

middleware.description: Updated list of middleware to be applied to the gateway

timeout.description: Updated timeout in milliseconds for gateway requests
Timeout in milliseconds for gateway requests

middleware.description: List of middleware applied to the gateway

modified.description: Unix timestamp of when the gateway was last modified

is_public.description: Whether the mapping is publicly accessible

timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for mapping requests

traffic_distribution.description: Traffic distribution configuration for A/B testing
